meanings.definition: A type of feldspar mineral commonly found in volcanic rocks.
meanings.sent1: The geologist studied the sanidines under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Miners discovered sanidines while exploring the volcano.
meanings.sent3: The sanidines in the rock formation seemed to be chatting with each other.
meanings.sent4: The sanidines sparkled like tiny jewels in the dark lava.
meanings.sent5: The vivid orange color of the sanidines made them stand out among the other minerals.
